CustomField.formula: IF(OriginalQuantityNmb__c != 0 && SyncedSAPBln__c = false, ( BX13__c / OriginalQuantityNmb__c ) * OrderQuantityNmb__c * (1 - ZPRO__c) * (1 - ZCOT__c) * (1 - ZPVO__c) * (1 - ZVJ1__c) * (1 - ZPME__c) * (1 - ZPSO__c) * (1 - XXES__c) * (1 - ZPXI__c), BX13__c)
CustomField.label: ICMS Final
